entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 30 km/h early in the afternoon then light late in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
